name: Neon Impact (dullies)
description:
Amaze Me Game Jam Submission

Game By: Isaac Torres

Music By: E. Zack Kennedy

Git: https://github.com/isaacHuh/amaze_me_game_jam

How to Play:

- Z, X, C, V, Space - control fingers

- Mouse to move  hand

- Left click to attack

- Press shift to see possible hand positions

- attack enemies with matching hand color
